mapper.select: SELECT D.IDX, D.NAME, D.SPONSOR, D.COMPLETION_RATE, D.COMPLETION_AMOUNT, DS.NAME AS 'STATUS' FROM DONATIONS D JOIN DONATION_STATUS DS ON D.IDX = DS.IDX ORDER BY D.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}

SELECT D.IDX, D.NAME, D.START_DATE, D.END_DATE, D.AMOUNT, D.COMPLETION_AMOUNT, D.COMPLETION_RATE, D.SPONSOR, D.SPONSOR_DETAIL, D.CONTENT, DS.NAME AS 'STATUS' FROM DONATIONS D JOIN DONATION_STATUS DS ON D.DONATION_STATUS_IDX = DS.IDX WHERE D.IDX=#{idx}
SELECT DC.IDX, U.NICKNAME, DC.CONTENT, DC.CREATED_AT FROM DONATION_COMMENTS DC JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX = DC.USER_IDX WHERE DC.DONATION_IDX=#{idx} ORDER BY DC.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DONATION_COMMENTS DC JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX = DC.USER_IDX WHERE DC.DONATION_IDX=#{idx}
SELECT DD.IDX, DD.DONATED_AMOUNT, DD.CREATED_AT, U.NICKNAME FROM DONATION_DETAILS DD JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX=DD.USER_IDX WHERE DD.DONATION_IDX=#{idx} ORDER BY DD.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
SELECT DD.IDX, DD.DONATED_AMOUNT, DD.CREATED_AT, U.NICKNAME FROM DONATION_DETAILS DD JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX=DD.USER_IDX WHERE DD.DONATION_IDX=#{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATION_COMMENTS(USER_IDX, DONATION_IDX, CONTENT) VALUES(#{userIdx}, #{donationIdx}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT POINT FROM USERS WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATION_DETAILS(USER_IDX, DONATION_IDX, DONATED_AMOUNT) VALUES(#{userIdx}, #{donationIdx}, #{donatedAmount})
mapper.update: UPDATE DONATIONS SET COMPLETION_AMOUNT = COMPLETION_AMOUNT + #{donatedAmount}, COMPLETION_RATE = (#{donatedAmount}*100) / AMOUNT WHERE IDX = #{donationIdx} AND DONATION_STATUS_IDX = 2
